alert.note: Alert for Chouteau; Hill; Liberty (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 11:14PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Liberty, southwestern Hill and northwestern Chouteau Counties through 1215 AM MDT... At 1114 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Knees, or 25 miles northwest of Fort Benton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kenilworth. This includes Highway 87 between mile markers 58 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
